mapper.select: select obj_.id, obj_.name, obj_.number, obj_.img_url, obj_.security_declaration, obj_.count, obj_.rownum from ( SELECT obj.id, obj.name, obj.number, obj.img_url, obj.security_declaration, obj.count, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( select id, number, name, img_url, security_declaration, count from activity_vote ORDER BY count DESC ) AS obj, ( SELECT @rownum := 0) r )AS obj_ where obj_.id = #{id}

select obj_.id, obj_.name, obj_.number, obj_.img_url, obj_.security_declaration, obj_.count, obj_.rownum from ( SELECT obj.id, obj.name, obj.number, obj.img_url, obj.security_declaration, obj.count, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( select id, number, name, img_url, security_declaration, count from activity_vote ORDER BY count DESC ) AS obj, ( SELECT @rownum := 0) r )AS obj_ where obj_.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') limit #{page},#{pageSize}

select obj_.id, obj_.name, obj_.number, obj_.img_url, obj_.security_declaration, obj_.count, obj_.rownum from ( SELECT obj.id, obj.name, obj.number, obj.img_url, obj.security_declaration, obj.count, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( select id, number, name, img_url, security_declaration, count from activity_vote ORDER BY count DESC ) AS obj, ( SELECT @rownum := 0) r )AS obj_ ORDER BY obj_.id ASC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT obj.id, obj.name, obj.number, obj.img_url, obj.security_declaration, obj.count, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( select id, number, name, img_url, security_declaration, count from activity_vote where count != 0 ORDER BY count DESC ) AS obj, ( SELECT @rownum := 0) r limit 0,#{total}
